br.com.caelum.vraptor.core

Class SafeResourceBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.ResourceBundle
      • br.com.caelum.vraptor.core.SafeResourceBundle

  • public class SafeResourceBundle
extends java.util.ResourceBundle
    A Resource bundle that doesn't throw exception when there is no resource of given key. It only returns ??? + key + ??? when the key doesn't exist.
    Since:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti
